column1: Local Foods////An excellent choice by Thomson.  It's not only been on my list of to-dos
column2: but also I've been hearing great things...so I was definitely excited to go.  It's in the old Antone's next to Benjy's in Rice Village.  Isn't it so cute?  I love the design
column3: decor and set up.  Just add more people and it would be perfect.  We did visit on a weekend and just a little early for dinner
column4: so that would probably explain the emptiness.  He says it gets crowded during weekday lunch hour.
